name: Dagger Flight
description:
After stealing the treasures of an ancient dungeon, the dagger conjuring mage needs to escape as quickly as possible! Will they get out with a few more coins found on their way or get stuck trying?

This game was made for the One Minute Game Jam. That means the entire game can be beaten in under one minute! It can be played in the browser and needs a mouse and keyboard to control.

Controls
  • A, D: Move left or right (the character moves forwards on their own)
  • Swipe across the screen: Throw a dagger in the swiping direction! You only have two and you can only shoot them again if you either collect or run past them.
Credits
  • 'Boss Theme' by sawsquarenoise: https://freemusicarchive.org/music/sawsquarenoise/dojokratos/boss-theme

Except for the skeleton sprites and a few sounds, the rest of the game and assets have been made in the last few days with some small hitbox changes done today after a friend's suggestion.
Also, this is my first game jam so I hope I did everything right!
